remove your hook from the loop and use a stitch marker or extra yarn to keep the loop from being lost cut a 2 foot length of dark pink yarn and use your crochet hook to pull a loop from the middle of that yarn through the next available stitch right past your loop that is on hold from here chain 10 in double yarn then gently tie the two loose ends together to end your chain careful not to pull too tight that your 10th chain shrinks remove your stitch marker from your original loop and single_crochet 10 along this double chain turn your work and single_crochet 10 more back along the other side of the chain once your return to the main part of the tail do one final single_crochet into the main body to complete the round tie off tail continued flatten the tail and using a needle and some yarn go back and forth through the tail to ensure it stays flat for the long spine section of the tail sew it so that the tops of the scs face the same direction sew the tail onto the back of the body centered legs using dark pink add 4 legs legs will go on the bottom corners of the body the front legs should be one row past the head and the back legs should be 1 row away from the back end for each leg cut a 2 foot section of dark pink yarn using our crochet hook pull the center of the 2 foot section of yarn through a stitch at each leg location using the loop on your crochet hook as a starting point chain 3 with doubled yarn drop one of the strands of yarn then do 3 scs into the last double chain chain and tie off then pull the end of the yarn through the last double chain your scs should have widened this hole a bit and then tie it together with the other lose strand of yarn weave both strands back through the legs and into the body to hide them gills in dark pink make 6 starting in the middle of a 2 section of dark pink yarn do 5 doubled up chains drop one strand and pull the remaining strand all the way through your last doubled up chain while holding the gill in place gently
